synopsis.text: School of Film and New Media at Tokyo University of the Arts, a bear crafted from simple shapes embarks on a journey. As the bear wanders through the forest, it encounters a variety of animals, sparking a narrative that revolves around their interactions. This captivating animation, accompanied by Miki Sakurai's music and produced by Mitsuko Okamoto, was created in 2014 by director Koya as part of their first-year project. Prepare to be charmed by this unique tale of a bear and its woodland companions.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
